General.Name: KTBNetwork Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Woori Venture Partners Co., Ltd,formerly known as Daol Investment Co., Ltd. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in seed stage, startup stage, early stage, turnaround, late stage, growth stage, pre -IPO, pipes, buy out, venture investments, corporate restructurings, mergers and acquisitions, and cross-border transactions. The firm focuses on small and medium sized venture companies and start-ups. The firm prefer to  invests in consumer service, medical/healthcare, education, digital media, entertainment & contents, internet/mobile sectors, mobility, Chemical, Manufacture, Semiconductor, Bio, ICT Platform Service, Metaverse &Software, electronic components, telecommunications equipment, services, game software, and in audio content technologies that form the basis of artificial intelligence-powered products, such as voice-activated smart speakers and connected cars, digital content sector including computer graphic, visual effects, VFX, augmented reality, and virtual reality sectors. The firm prefers to invest in companies based in South Korea. Woori Venture Partners Co., Ltd was founded in June 2008 and is based in Seongnam, South Korea with additional offices in Seoul, South Korea, San Francisco, California, Shanghai, China, and Singapore, Singapore.
